original_text: A priest with a hand that is the wrong shape must not offer food to God. A priest with a foot that is the wrong shape must not offer food to God.
korean_text: 발 부러진 자나 손 부러진 자나

sentences.original_text: A priest with a hand that is the wrong shape
must not offer food to God
A priest with a foot that is the wrong shape
must not offer food to God
